```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

Sys.setenv("VROOM_CONNECTION_SIZE" = 131072 * 5)
migration_Tompkins_NY_2021 =read_csv("C:/Users/Jeeves/Documents/Projects/MigrationData/migration_by_county.csv")

migration_Tompkins_NY_2021 %>% 
  select(Label, matches("Tompkins")) %>%
  select(-contains("Margin of Error")) %>%
  rename("Total(est)" = "Tompkins County, New York!!Total!!Estimate") %>%
  rename("Moved; within same county" = "Tompkins County, New York!!Moved; within same county!!Estimate") %>%
  rename("Moved; from different county" = "Tompkins County, New York!!Moved; from different county, same state!!Estimate") %>%
  rename("Moved; from abroad" = "Tompkins County, New York!!Moved; from abroad!!Estimate") %>% 
  rename("Moved; from different state" = "Tompkins County, New York!!Moved; from different state!!Estimate") %>% 
  head()
#  ifelse(is.na = TRUE, )


```
